goal: Perform dimensionality reduction to enhance interpretability and efficiency of analysis using principal component analysis.
persona: An experienced data scientist specializing in ecommerce analytics, focused on leveraging advanced techniques like principal component analysis to reduce dimensionality and enhance data interpretability for strategic insights. With a keen interest in transforming complex datasets into actionable business intelligence, this analyst seeks to uncover hidden patterns and streamline decision-making processes through proficient data manipulation and visualization skills.
